pages.name: intro
pages.prompt: Hello. We could really use your opinion on a study, it will not take more than 30s :)

pages.name: question1
pages.prompt: What are your favourite colours (3 max.)?
answers: it is green without a doubt, green I said

pages.name: question2
pages.prompt: What planet do you come from?

pages.name: questionEarth
pages.prompt: How would you describe your fellow humans?

pages.name: questionMars
pages.prompt: How would you describe your fellow marsians?

pages.name: questionOther
pages.prompt: What kind of a person are you?
answers: I don't identify as a person

pages.name: question3
pages.prompt: How many bananas do you eat on a daily basis?

pages.name: conclusion
pages.prompt: Thanks for your participation, that's so kind of you
